data.name: Who is it, Poirot?
data.description: You are the talented Detective Hercule Poirot, star of many Agatha Christie murder mystery novels. In the middle of a case, you are given a note with the name of a killer on it, and must announce it to all of your suspects. You must make sure the name is correctly capitalized, meaning that each word in the string starts with a capital letter. -If the string is empty, return "There is no killer!" (the string will never be null). -Otherwise return either: "I am the killer!", "You are the killer!", or "(name) is the killer!" depending on what the string holds (for example, "Poirot" or "me" should return "I am the killer!" while "you" should return "You are the killer!"). Good luck, detective!
